# gridID 1

gridtype  = projection
gridsize  = 45248
xname     = rlon
xlongname = longitude in rotated pole grid
xunits    = degrees
yname     = rlat
ylongname = latitude in rotated pole grid
yunits    = degrees
xsize     = 202
ysize     = 224
xfirst    = -27.605
xinc      = 0.22
yfirst    = -22.605
yinc      = 0.22
grid_mapping = rotated_pole
grid_mapping_name = rotated_latitude_longitude
long_name = "coordinates of the rotated North Pole"
grid_north_pole_latitude = 39.25f
grid_north_pole_longitude = -162.f
